events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorised under the engineering department based on your skills and experience mentioned in your resume.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to manage your application and guide you through the upcoming recruitment process steps.
Our team completed the initial screening of your profile and found your experience relevant to the software engineer position requirements.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening questions and confirming your availability for the technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC with our senior software engineers to assess your coding skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving abilities and good knowledge of relevant programming languages.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 15th at 3 PM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career goals.
